headline: Show HN: Fciv.net 3D Version Redesigned
description: Fciv.net updated today! The new release is 3D only, the 2d version has been removed! The city dialog has been redesigned for 3D view. Further, the start screen has been redesigned for better UX also! https://www.fciv.net/
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Fciv.net三维版重新设计
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Fciv.net三維版重新設計
